name: Vengeful
description: Tammi, Cam, Meek, and Draya are all back and still full of drama. Tammi has a stalker with some sort of personal vendetta against her, and it seems as though their objective is to ruin her marriage. Draya is still struggling with addiction and it seems as though she is going from bad to worse.

name: From the Dirt
description:
Intellect is a famous music producer, but he is proof that money can't buy happiness. As a result of a hard childhood, love is something that Intellect doesn't know how to express and it could cost him the one person that he needs in his life. 

Serenity is humble and loving and is trying her best to be there for Intellect but his short temper and mood swings are pushing her away more and more each day.

name: Vengeance
description:
Meek is home from prison and he has a vendetta against the two people that betrayed him. who will pay the ultimate price for crossing him?

Draya was on the straight and narrow until a ghost from her past opened old wounds and creates havoc in her life.

name: Betrayed
description:
Urban fiction novel. Tammi married Meek for better or worse, but when he is incarcerated she becomes lonely, frustrated, and stressed. Meek trusts his best friend Cam to look after his family while he is away, but this one mistake could lead to the ultimate betrayal. 

Draya is a correctional officer in search of fast money and excitement in her life. She thinks she has found it with bad boy Meek, but meeting him proves to be something she will deeply regret.
